definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sink, sink down (NH. id.; Aram. t.ba9, [[טְבַע]]; Ph. [[טבע]] coin; As. ṭêbû, sink in, ṭabbî’u, diver (water-fowl) etc., v. Muss-Arnolt:JBL xi, 1892, 170 Dl:HWB; Ar. t.aba9a seal, stamp, imprint; Eth. t’am9a dip)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[טָבַעְתִּי]] Ps 69:3; [[טָֽבְעוּ]] Ps 9:16, La 2:9; Impf. [[וַיִּטְבַּע]] Je 38:6; [[וַתִּטְבַּע]] 1Sa 17:49; [[אֶטְבָָּעָה]] Ps 69:15; —sink, sink down, intrans., c. [[בְּ]]; 1Sa 17:49 (stone into Goliath's forehead); Je 38:6 (Jerem. in mire of dungeon); La 2:9 (gates of Jerus. into ground); metaph. of distress; Ps 69:3 [[בִיוֵן מְחוּלָה]]´[[ט]]; Ps 69:15 (‖[[החילני מִטִּיט]]); nations into the pit ([[בַּשַּׁחַת]]) Ps 9:16.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[טֻבְּעוּ]] be sunk Ex 15:4 (poem) of Egyptians drowned [[בְּיַם־סוּף]].

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הָטְבְּעוּ]] be sunk [[בַּבּׂץ]] in the mire, of feet, metaph. of entanglements and difficulties Je 38:22; [[הָטְבָָּעוּ]], of pedestals ([[אֲדָנִים]]) of the earth, as settled, planted [[עַל]] Job 38:6 (‖[[ירה פִּנׇּה]]); abs. of mountains Pr 8:25.
